data.title: Survival of the Illest
data.meta_description: Survival of the Illest is a song, performed by Division All Stars. The song was initially released exclusively for the Hypnosis Mic -Alternative Rap Battle- and released on digital platforms on July 17th, 2020. Lyrics: Amon Hayashi Composition: DirtyOrange & Amon Hayashi Arrangement: DirtyOrange...
data.text:
---(Ichiro Yamada)---

One, and here comes the two, to three bros, in the place to be

The first mic, Double B will kick it off

Living in this city and dying in this city

---(Jiro Yamada & Saburo Yamada)---

We ain't nothing to fuck with!

---(Ichiro Yamada)---

Bonds of steel, the best of the best

Instant connection

TOKYO KILLER MIC CREW

This juice will never run dry

This is my hood, come on!

---(Jiro Yamada)---

Wanna battle me?

Yo, haha! Mic check

No matter the year, I won't change my way

On just this one path only

Live fast on Tokyo streets

---(Saburo Yamada)---

Isn't that enough?

No matter how many times you try

You have no chance of winning

Just give up, please

Ready or not, here we come

Here we come! Here we come!

Here we come! Here we come!

---(Buster Bros!!!)---

I'm so hypnotic, now together with us

Got to keep goin'

Rhyme and beat, flow, and you (Hey!)

They're essential, and you (Hey!)

Again, again

I'm so hypnotic, now together with us

Got to keep goin'

Rhyme and beat, flow, and you (Hey!)

They're essential, and you (Hey!)

City's on fire!

This is now a scene, it's a must-see

City's on fire!

Survival of the illest

We'll make this explosive wave resound

A hot wind that dries even the sea breeze

We'll snatch away all the props

It's a lyrical murder

---(Samatoki Aohitsugi)---

A criminal gunman!

Bouncing rhymes won't work

It's Mr. Dirty Cop

Cuffs on hands, you're under arrest

More, gimme mo' money y'all

.45 caliber, full clip rhyme, yo!

God in the details, dangerous to a minutia (Militia)

Cold-blooded

As long as humans are humans

There'll be a battle

It's goin' down! Bounce, come on!
